content.text:
# Filmfare Award for Best Female Playback Singer â€“ Marathi

The Filmfare Best Female Playback Singer Award is given by the Filmfare magazine as part of its annual Filmfare Awards for Marathi Cinema, to the best male playback singer of a soundtrack. This category was first presented in 2014. Ketaki Mategaonkar was the first recipient of this award for her song "Mala Ved Lagale" from the film Lai Bhaari.
